trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a designer in a design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Fornece as configurações de propriedades de aparência para um designer em um ambiente de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Designer themes define the look and feel of a designer.
trans-unit.target: Temas designers definem a aparência de um designer.

trans-unit.source: This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui quaisquer estilos de plano de fundo, estilos de primeiro plano, fontes e ícones definidos para o designer.

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom designer theme if you want to provide configuration abilities to properties unique to your designer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um tema personalizado de designer para fornecer capacidades de configuração para propriedades exclusivas para o designer.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a designer theme for a custom designer, the theme from the base class is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um tema de designer para um designer personalizado, o tema da classe base é usado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> that contains the theme information for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> que contém informações de tema para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> to end with when using a color gradient for the background color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> com o qual terminar ao usar um gradiente de cores para a cor da tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The background ending <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
trans-unit.target: O final do plano de fundo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> indicates the ending color of a background gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> indica a cor final de um gradiente de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: To use background gradient color, set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para usar cores de gradiente do plano de fundo, defina o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The background will gradually change color from the starting color to the ending color.
trans-unit.target: O plano de fundo será gradualmente alterar cor da cor inicial para a cor final.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting color of the background when using a color gradient on the background.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor inicial da tela de fundo ao usar um gradiente de cores na tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The background starting <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.
trans-unit.target: A partir do plano de fundo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> indicates the background color, or the beginning color of a background gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> indica a cor do plano de fundo ou a cor do início de um gradiente de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: To use background gradient color, set the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para usar cores de gradiente do plano de fundo, defina o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The background will gradually change color from the start color to the end color.
trans-unit.target: O plano de fundo será gradualmente alterar cor da cor inicial para a cor final.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode" /> that describes the background style.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode" /> que descreve o estilo de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A> to get or set how the background displays color.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A> para obter ou definir como exibe a cor do plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A> can be set to one of four modes:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackgroundStyle%2A> pode ser definido como um dos quatro modos:

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from upper right to lower left.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um gradiente da direita superior para a esquerda inferior.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from upper left to lower right.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um gradiente da esquerda superior para a direita inferior.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from left to right.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um gradiente da esquerda para a direita.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a gradient from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um gradiente de cima para baixo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font for the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte do tema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> of the theme.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> do tema.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BoldFont%2A> represents the font to use for highlighted text for the theme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BoldFont%2A> representa a fonte a ser usado para texto realçado para o tema.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor" /> for the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor" /> do tema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor" /> of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor" /> do tema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor%2A> is the color used to draw borders for shapes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderColor%2A> é a cor usada para desenhar bordas de formas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the BorderPen for the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o BorderPen do tema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that represents the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen" /> of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> que representa o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen" /> do tema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen%2A> is the pen used to draw borders for shapes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderPen%2A> é a caneta usada para desenhar bordas de formas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for the border.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo usado para a borda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle" /> enumeration that represents the style used for the border.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle" /> enumeração que representa o estilo usado para a borda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderStyle%2A> is the style of line to draw for borders of shapes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderStyle%2A> é o estilo da linha a ser desenhada para bordas de formas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the border in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a largura da borda em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The width of the border in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura da borda em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderWidth%2A> is the width in pixels for borders of shapes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BorderWidth%2A> é a largura em pixels para bordas de formas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the geometry of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a geometria do designer.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that describes the geometry of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração que descreve a geometria do designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerGeometry%2A> represents the default geometry of shapes for the theme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerGeometry%2A> representa a geometria do padrão de formas do tema.

trans-unit.source: Draws shapes with squared corners.
trans-unit.target: Desenha formas com cantos quadrados.

trans-unit.source: Draws shapes with rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: Desenha formas com cantos arredondados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada ao designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImage%2A> is the default image to display for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImage%2A> é a imagem padrão a ser exibida para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image path for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caminho da imagem para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The image path for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O caminho da imagem para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImagePath%2A> is the path to the image file to use as the default image to display for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.DesignerImagePath%2A> é o caminho para o arquivo de imagem para usar como imagem padrão a ser exibida para o designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados e opcionalmente os gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando `disposing` é `true`, esse método versões todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer gerenciados objetos que <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font of the text used by the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte do texto usado pelo tema.

trans-unit.source: The font of the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: A fonte do tema designer.

trans-unit.source: `Font` is used to display text in the designer.
trans-unit.target: `Font` é usado para exibir texto no designer.

trans-unit.source: The `Font` property determines the font to use for regular text displayed in the designer.
trans-unit.target: O `Font` propriedade determina a fonte a ser usado para texto normal exibido no designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the foreground.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor do primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor de primeiro plano do tema.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.ForeColor%2A> property to specify the foreground color of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.ForeColor%2A> propriedade para especificar a cor de primeiro plano do tema.

trans-unit.source: The foreground color is usually the color of the text.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a cor de primeiro plano é a cor do texto.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um personalizado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> derivando de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> classe e configurando as propriedades apropriadas para o novo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o tema em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, aplicar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> object associated with the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> associado ao tema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> object associated with the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> objeto associado com o tema.

trans-unit.source: Assigning this property causes the brush associated with the theme to draw filled lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir essa propriedade faz com que o pincel associado ao tema para desenhar linhas preenchidas e curvas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> used for painting the foreground of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> usado para pintar o primeiro plano do tema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is used to paint the foreground of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> que é usado para pintar o primeiro plano do tema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> is used to draw a line of a specified width and style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> é usado para desenhar uma linha de uma largura especificada e um estilo.

trans-unit.source: The line drawn by a `Pen` object can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures.
trans-unit.target: A linha desenhada por um `Pen` objeto pode ser preenchido em uma variedade de estilos de preenchimento, incluindo cores sólidas e texturas.

trans-unit.source: The fill style depends on which brush or texture used as the fill object.
trans-unit.target: O estilo de preenchimento depende de qual pincel ou de textura usado como o objeto de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the location and size of the area on the background.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica o local e o tamanho da área da tela de fundo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a brush used to paint the area specified by the rectangle passed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um pincel usado para pintar a área especificada pelo retângulo transmitido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that is used to fill interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> que é usado para preencher os interiores das formas gráficas como retângulos, elipses, tortas, polígonos e caminhos.

trans-unit.source: The background brush is used to fill the interior of the background of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O pincel do plano de fundo é usado para preencher o interior do plano de fundo do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the image of the theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da imagem do tema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the image.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.ImageSize%2A> is the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the default image used by the theme for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.ImageSize%2A> é o <xref:System.Drawing.Size> da imagem padrão usada pelo tema para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o tema do designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> with the ambient theme.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> com o tema do ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Called to signal changes to ambient settings.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para sinalizar as alterações nas configurações de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.OnAmbientPropertyChanged%2A> is used to notify the theme to apply changes to ambient properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.OnAmbientPropertyChanged%2A> é usado para notificar o tema para aplicar alterações às propriedades do ambiente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho do designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho do designer.

trans-unit.source: The size property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de tamanho representa o <xref:System.Drawing.Size> do designer.
